sentences.en: All kinds of precision machine tools are made in this factory.
sentences.cn: 这家工厂制造各种精密机床.

sentences.en: Be careful about the precision of detail in your descriptions.
sentences.cn: 在你的描述中,必须认真地考虑细节的精确度.

sentences.en: He lacked profundity and analytical precision.
sentences.cn: 他缺乏深度和分析的精确性。

sentences.en: Her precision became a standing joke with colleagues.
sentences.cn: 她事事讲究精确，同事们经常拿这事开玩笑。

sentences.en: Planes fly daily over regular routes with timetable precision.
sentences.cn: 飞机每天精确地按时刻表飞行在各条航线上。

sentences.en: precision bombing
sentences.cn: 精确轰炸

sentences.en: precision engineering
sentences.cn: 精密工程

sentences.en: Precision instruments are used to help pilots in guiding their aircraft.
sentences.cn: 精密仪器用来帮助飞行员操作飞机.

sentences.en: The army used precision - guided munitions to blow up enemy targets.
sentences.cn: 军队用精确瞄准的枪炮炸掉敌方目标.

sentences.en: The choir sang with precision.
sentences.cn: 唱诗班的演唱准确无误。

sentences.en: The limit of its precision is analyzed theoretically, via simulation, and experimentally.
sentences.cn: 经由模拟， 和实验式地，它的精密的界限理论上被分析。

sentences.en: The work entails precision.
sentences.cn: 这工作需要精确无误.

sentences.en: The work was carried out with military precision (= the work was done in a carefully planned and exact way ) .
sentences.cn: 这项工作做得严谨细致，有如军事行动。

sentences.en: This is a high precision job . There mustn't be the slightest slip.
sentences.cn: 这可是细活,不能有一星半点差错.

sentences.en: This little pill targets cancer cells with uncanny precision.
sentences.cn: 这种小药丸能神奇地精确击中癌细胞.

sentences.en: This precision instrument is worth 10,000 yuan.
sentences.cn: 这台精密仪器价值一万元.

sentences.en: To minimize collateral damage maximum precision in bombing was required.
sentences.cn: 为了尽量减低附带性破坏，轰炸须做到最大程度的精确。

sentences.en: We can manufacture high - precision machine tools.
sentences.cn: 我们能造精密机床.

sentences.en: We require the agency in our market for your precision apparatus.
sentences.cn: 我们要求做贵司精密仪器在我们市场的代理。

sentences.en: With quick precision he slapped her three more times.
sentences.cn: 接着,他在她脸上又快又准地连打了三巴掌.

phrases.tran_cn: 精密加工；精密机械加工

trans.tran_en: made or done in a very exact way
the quality of being very exact or correct
